AffixDesc: ['Link Tutorial Stage', '<color=#0D70BC>Swamp Floor</color>: Contaminates Signal Orbs while you stand on it. Remove it with Fireball or Lava Floor.']
['<color=#0D70BC>Self-Destructing Hydraulic</color>: Explodes upon death. Contaminates Signal Orbs if you are caught by the explosion.']

['<color=#0D70BC>Rattan Armor</color>: Trigger Ignition to remove it. ['<color=#0D70BC>Heavy Watermelon</color>: Appears in group and dies after being Ignited for 5s.', '<color=#0D70BC>Mega Watermelon</color>: After defeating 20 smaller Watermelons, the Mega Watermelon will appear.']
['<color=#0D70BC>The Dominator</color>: A Golden Age deity who dominates <color=#0D70BC>Swamp Floor</color> and <color=#0D70BC>Rattan Armor</color>.']
